text: Goe nogo haga dagaloaha gimaadou anadilaangi, malaa, Goe hudee hagawelewele hua igolo gi Jerusalem, idimaa, ma di gonduu mo dono waahale haga madagu ni aau. Digau o nia guongo aanei i madau daha gu haga balumee Jerusalem, mo au daangada, idimaa go madau huaidu mo nia huaidu o madau maadua mmaadua ala ne hai.
